currency.title: Currency
currency.desc1: Currency, or points, are a method to reward your users for being a part of your community. They can earn them from being in chat or winning them in games/events.
currency.desc2: You can find more information & documentation <5>here</5>.
currency.slots: You have {currCount}/{totalCount} slots used. Pro users get {proCount}!
currency.active: Successfully changed the active currency to {name}.

online.title: Channel Online
online.desc: Have this enabled if you only want users to earn currency when you're actively streaming. Note: This only effects passive earning. Users playing chat games while offline will still earn or lose points.

provider.title: Enabled Providers
provider.desc: Select the providers in which you want users to earn currency from.

tracker.title: Tracker
tracker.desc1: The tracker is needed to tell BeepBot to process currencies for your channel. We will try to keep this active for you, but there will be occasions where you'll need to toggle it back on. So you can use the controls below to do so.
tracker.desc2: You can also turn it off! Sometimes you may not want to have users earning, so you have full control over what happens.

state.enabled: {name} tracker is enabled for processing currencies.
state.disabled: {name} tracker is disabled for processing currencies.

name.title: Name
name.help: The name will also be the command. (Casing won't matter for the command)

state.title: Earning State
state.help: The active state for what amount of currency users will earn.

dailyClaim.title: Daily Claim
dailyClaim.help: The amount (in points) users can claim for their daily bonus.

earn.title: Earn Time
earn.help: The time (in seconds) on how often currency should be allocated to users.

active.title: Active Time
active.help: The time (in seconds) for when a user is no longer treated as active.

dailyClaim.title: Daily Claiming
dailyClaim.help: Allow users to claim a daily bonus.

stealing.title: User Stealing
stealing.help: Allow users to steal currency from other users.

stealingGain.title: Stealing Gain
stealingGain.help: Allow the targeted user to gain the losers currency after a failed steal.

wallets.title: Wallets Enabled
wallets.help: Enforce the usage of wallets for the currency.

gifting.title: Point Transfers
gifting.help: Allow users to transfer points to other users.

stealPercentage.title: Steal Percentage
stealPercentage.help: The percentage chance of the user being able to steal from a user.

maxTakingPercentage.title: Max Stealing Percentage
maxTakingPercentage.help: The maximum (in percent) of the points the user can steal from the other user.

stealingLoss.title: Stealing Loss
stealingLoss.help: Should users lose some of the currency they could've gained. If they lose a steal to another user.

stealingLossPercentage.title: Stealing Loss Percentage
stealingLossPercentage.help: The maximum (in percent) of the currency that the user loses when they are unable to steal from another user.

gamble.title: Gambling Enabled
gamble.help: Enable the gamble command for this currency.

gambleLimit.title: Gamble Limit
gambleLimit.help: Control the amount of currency which users can gamble away. This is global over all games the bot features. Setting this to 0 disables the limiting.

roles.title: Blocked Roles
roles.help: Users with the selected roles will be blocked from earning points.

users.title: Block Users
users.help: Type in names separated by commas to block specific users from earning points.

example.title: Example User Earning
example.desc1: Formula: (Generic + Subscriber + Regular + Moderator + VIP) = {number} * Earn Rate
example.desc2: (Math is based off your active earning state: {state})

state.name: State needs to have a name.

other.title: Other Settings
other.desc1: Use the tabs below to change other settings.

table.name: User
table.filterDesc: Filter down the listing for a specific provider.

bulk.title: {method} currency for {users} user(s)
bulk.reset: You are about to reset the currency for the selected users. This action can NOT be reversed! Hitting save will execute the reset.

feedback.badNumber: The input value for the currency is invalid. Please try again.
feedback.tooSmall: The input value is too small. Must be larger than 1.
feedback.success: Successfully edited the currency for {users} user(s).

reset.title: Reset Earnt Currency
reset.desc1: WARNING: This will reset all the currency in which users have earnt. This is irreversible, ensure you want to do this.!

add.title: Create Currency
add.desc1: Go on give your currency a name! This is also the name which will be used as the command in your chat.
add.helper: The name needs to be single worded, but also contain no numbers or special characters.

cost.zero: Cost needs to be more than 0.

lang.desc1: Customize some of the messages used in command responses. You can leave these empty also to use the default language. Otherwise you can tweak to match your currency theme!

userAmount.title: Message for when users use the !{name} command.

dailyAlready.title: Message for when the use has already claimed.

dailyClaimed.title: Message for when the user claims the daily bonus.
